data.message: Welcome to Jupiter! Jupiter is the largest planet in the Solar System. Jupiter has 79 moons.
Welcome to Mercury! This is the closest planet to the Sun. It is the smallest planet.
Welcome to Venus! Venus is the brightest and the hottest planet.
welcome to Mars! Mars is also known as the red planet. It is the closest planet to Earth.
Welcome to Earth. This is where we live. Earth is the only planet where water is liquid. Earth has one moon.
Welcome to Saturn. Saturn has beautiful rings around it which are made of ice and dust.
Welcome to Uranus. Uranus is a giant gas ball.
Welcome to Neptune. Neptune is the farthest planet from the Sun. Neptune is the coolest and the bluest planet.
